title: People's century: 1900-1999
brief_description: ‘People’s century’ is a unique combination of rare archival footage and personal testimony that chronicles the 20th century. Through fascinating eyewitness accounts, this acclaimed BBC, WGBH/Boston co production examines how political, economic and technological changes transformed the lives of ordinary people. There are 26 episodes in the series (included on 8 tapes).
